query.statement:
SELECT '0' AS CHECK , MM013.EBELN AS EBELN , (SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LANG = #G_LANG# AND CODE1 = '10' AND CODE2 = MAX(MM013.EKGRP)) AS EKGRP , MAX(MM013.NAME1) AS NAME1 , SAPHEE.GET_CURRDATA(MAX(MM013.WAERS),SUM(MM013.NETPR*MM013.MENGE)) AS NETPR , SUM(MM013.MENGE) AS MENGE , MAX(MM013.WAERS) AS WAERS , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MAX(MM013.SDATE)) AS SDATE , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MAX(MM013.STIME)) AS STIME , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MAX(MM013.DDATE)) AS DDATE , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MAX(MM013.DTIME)) AS DTIME , MAX(MM013.STATE) AS STATE , SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(MM013.MANDT, MAX(MM013.LIFNR)) AS RV_NAME , CASE WHEN MIN(MM013.WERKS) <> '2000' AND MIN(SAPHEE.GET_JAJEA_BALJU(MM013.MANDT, MM013.POSID,MM013.MATNR)) < 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS BIGO -- ,'0' AS BIGO FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT013 AS MM013 WHERE MM013.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM013.LIFNR = #LIFNR# AND MM013.STATE = '2'
AND MM013.UDATE BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND #UDATE2#
AND MM013.SDATE BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND #UDATE2#
AND MM013.WERKS = #WERKS#
AND MM013.LGORT = #LGORT#
AND MM013.EKGRP = #EKGRP#
AND MM013.POSID BETWEEN #POSID1# AND #POSID2#
AND MM013.MATNR LIKE #MATNR# || '%'
AND MM013.EBELN = #EBELN#
AND MM013.EXTWG LIKE '%'||#EXTWG#||'%'
-- AND MM013.POTYPE = ''
GROUP BY MANDT, EBELN ORDER BY EBELN,SDATE,STIME FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
